generated_text:
1. "The Fault in Our Stars is a decent romantic drama, but it fails to reach the emotional heights of A Walk to Remember."
2. "The Notebook is a passable tearjerker, but it doesn't come close to the depth of Titanic."
3. "The Pursuit of Happyness is a competent biopic, but it can't compare to the brilliance of 12 Years a Slave."
4. "The Time Traveler's Wife is a workable sci-fi romance, but it doesn't even attempt the complexity of Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind."
